sys_ui_page.description: User redirected to this page after authenticated on VRA Cloud for OAuth flow.
sys_ui_page.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<j:jelly trim="false" xmlns:j="jelly:core" xmlns:g="glide" xmlns:j2="null" xmlns:g2="null">
	<g2:evaluate var="jvar_response">
		try{
		var code =  RP.getParameterValue("code");
		var state = RP.getParameterValue("state");
		var oauthUtil = new vRAOAuthUtil();
		var response = oauthUtil.processAuthCode(code,state);
		response;
		} catch (exception) {
		gs.error('Caught exception inside ui_page.oauth_redirect  : '+exception);
		}
	</g2:evaluate>
	<body onload='call();'>
	</body>
</j:jelly>
sys_ui_page.name: oauth_redirect
